definition: good-looking/charming/(of goods) in great demand/(coll.) to season (food)

sentences.english: Pretty and touching dresses are girls' eternal choice.
sentences.chinese: 俏丽动人的服饰，是姑娘们永恒的选择。

sentences.english: If Jack's in love, he's no judge of Jill's beauty.
sentences.chinese: 如果杰克爱上了吉尔，吉尔再丑他也说俏丽。

sentences.english: Most handsome man or pretty woman will face another kind of problem.
sentences.chinese: 多数英俊的男人或俏丽的女人将面对另一问题。

sentences.english: You can see, I'm pretty and lovely.
sentences.chinese: 您能看，我是俏丽和可爱的。

sentences.english: At the end of the last century, a marvelous spire was added, which makes it soar up slenderly into the German skies.
sentences.chinese: 它又被加上了完美的塔尖，俏丽地矗立在德国的天空。

sentences.english: Rich in eyebrow have energy, yellow brown hue, youth and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 富含眉毛生养能量，黄褐色调，青春甜美，活泼俏丽。

sentences.english: She was a handsome woman, just thirty-four.
sentences.chinese: 她是位俏丽的女人，只有三十四岁。

sentences.english: Dress cute wherever you go, life is too short to blend in - Paris Hilton
sentences.chinese: 无论到哪儿都要打扮俏丽，生命短暂，何苦从众。

sentences.english: Her beautiful roses won third prize at the flower show.
sentences.chinese: 例句她那些俏丽的玫瑰在花展上得了三等奖。

sentences.english: Irve been to London , which is a beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 咱去过伦敦，那是个俏丽哒城市。

sentences.english: This is the beautiful woman in the moon , the Moon Fairy.
sentences.chinese: 这便是玉轮上俏丽女人的传说了。

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
to have bright eyes and white teeth
sweet, fair, and graceful (of a woman)/a seductive woman/secluded (bower)
pleasant/agreeable/a person after one's heart (charming person)/a gifted person
